[60FPS]
006F5C88 00000001

[30 FPS]
006F5C88 00000002

[15 FPS]
006F5C88 00000003

[60FPS (hold R button for 30FPS)]
D3000000 00000000
006F5C88 00000001
DD000000 00000100
006F5C88 00000002
D0000000 00000000

[No-Antialiasing]
006F5C80 00000000

[Antialiasing]
006F5C80 00010000

[60 FPS, No-Antialiasing (hold R button for 30 FPS with Antialiasing)]
D3000000 00000000
006F5C88 00000001
006F5C80 00000000
DD000000 00000100
006F5C88 00000002
006F5C80 00010000
D0000000 00000000

[FPS Selector (SELECT + D-Left/D-Up/D-Right)]
DD000000 00000004
DD000000 00000020
006F5C88 00000003
006F5C80 00010000
D2000000 00000001
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000040
006F5C88 00000002
006F5C80 00010000
D2000000 00000001
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000010
006F5C88 00000001
006F5C80 00000000
D2000000 00000001
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
{Hold SELECT + D-Left/D-Up/D-Right for 15, 30, or 60 FPS. Antialiasing is disabled for 60 FPS.}
